document_data.title: The Hidden Page
document_data.author: [[Will Hindmarch]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Hidden Page''' is an adventure using the 5{{th}} edition ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]'' ruleset and the second adventure made to tie in to the [[Wikipedia:Magic: The Gathering|''Magic: The Gathering'']] crossover set ''[[Adventures in the Forgotten Realms]]''. It is designed for a party of four to six 8{{th}}-level characters.
